content:
Alya Abbott , would it be an improvement if we try to align these 3 icons over here with each other-->

1.) Cross icon.
2.) Add stream
3.) stream menu 3 dots icon.
image.png

Jai soni said:

Alya Abbott , would it be an improvement if we try to align these 3 icons over here with each other-->

1.) Cross icon.
2.) Add stream
3.) stream menu 3 dots icon.
image.png

I would have shared my thoughts but I don't fully understand the question.

also, I worked on the three dots opacity and color inconsistency on issue #20600
Hm, I'm not sure the x needs to be aligned; probably having a good distance between the x and the right side of the search box is more important.
In future I would ignore smaller UI bugs in favor of implementing the new design, since all the little things would be reevaluated

I think it's reasonable to deprioritize minor tweaks in the main message feed UI, yeah. We can continue to make these types of changes in the modals and settings, as they won't be touched by the first phase of the redesign.
